edit-class-names-menu.name: Edit Prepared Caster Class Names
edit-class-names-menu.label: Edit
edit-class-names-menu.title: Edit Prepared Caster Class Names
edit-class-names-menu.note: Add any extra class names you want to use for the sheet spellbook preparation functionality. Note: these should be the proper title case names such as 'Wizard', not 'wizard'.

show-prep-limit-colours.name: Change Colors For Preparable Spells
show-prep-limit-colours.hint: If ticked, changes the backgrounds and preparation icons color for preparable spells in the spells tab when you reach or exceed your limit. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

use-class-sources.name: Use Class Sources
use-class-sources.hint: If ticked, allows you to manage spell sources for preparation spellcasters. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

prep-bar-top.name: Spell Preparation Bar At Top
prep-bar-top.hint: If ticked, shows a spell preparation bar at the top of the spells tab. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

prep-bar-bottom.name: Spell Preparation Bar At Bottom
prep-bar-bottom.hint: If ticked, shows a spell preparation bar at the bottom of the spells tab. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

identify-permission.name: Identify Permission Level
identify-permission.hint: Minimum user role required to identify items.

remove-attunement-control.name: Remove Attunement Control
remove-attunement-control.hint: For users below the above role, also remove the attunement control for unidentified items from the character sheet. You will need to reopen sheets to see the change.

add-spell-manager.name: Manage Added Spells
add-spell-manager.hint: Creates a spell manager window when you add spells to an actor, allowing you to set the preparation mode and the source if 'Use Class Sources' is enabled.
